145.content:
In Nerima craziest things can take place, and the most absurd and convoluted plots may be conceived to attain the most unthinkable prize. And quit often the ending result is far from what the plotter was expecting…
So, who is the one aiming to control Nabiki Tendo, maybe the main villain of Nerima, who is pretty much never punished for her misdeeds?
145.title: There are also many other possibilities…

choices: Actually, for now at least, it worked as he wanted, he truly did aim for Nabiki
In fact he didn’t even have a chance to try to use it
1452.content:
Hikaru Gosunkugi was one of Ranma’s many rivals, even if pretty much no one considered him as such. In fact, the only characteristic he shared with other rivals was his general dislike of Ranma. He was also infatuated with Akane Tendo – something so common in Nerima, that you have to wonder if it wasn’t an epidemic.
But contrary to all others he wasn’t a Martial Artist… in fact he was may be as far from being one as it was physically possible without being a cripple. Instead he was making du with some kind of ritualistic magic and strange artefacts that seemed to easily fall into his hands. They hilariously failed or backfired more often than not, and even in rare case where it worked as intended Hikaru seemed too surprised by that to press any kind of advantage. So, all in all Hikaru Gosunkugi, while certainly a weirdo, could be considered a relatively harmless weirdo if only…
Yes, of course there was an “if”. As the vast majority of Nerima’s resident Hikaru was literally uncapable to think before he acts. This little fact was one of the main reasons why there were so much chaos, destruction and general maihem around. But thoughtless action of some overpowered Martial Artist would mostly cause just one more fight with some collateral damage… On the other hand, a wannabe wizard using something he know nothing about just to reach his one single-minded goal… That can cause so much more troubles…
And that was exactly what happened, Hikaru Gosunkugi got his hands what he believed will finally offer him a chance with his beloved Akane and acted without thinking. He didn’t try to test if it would work as advised… damn, he didn’t even read the manual! Or the contract that he did sign to obtain it… And so…
1452.title: VooDoo priest strikes again!

14522.content:
Hikaru couldn’t contain his excitement: at long last he could make Akane truly see him! It’s as if his Lucky Star has at last started to shine! According to what he was said this magical Idol he got will allow him to gain love and obedience of any girl! Oh sweet Akane…
And he got it literally for free! Even if this guy was weird and kinda creepy… but still the only this he from Hikaru was to accept some strange mark. This mark was a little strange, it combined in itself the conventional symbols for male and female, but also looked cool... So truly he was in luck and now only thing left to do was to find Akane…
“What do we have here?” his sweet dreams were interrupted by a dreaded voice. Voice of Nabiki Tendo, the scariest person in the school…
‘’Nothing !!! Nothing !!!’’ he gave a squeak jumping in the air. Upon returning on the earth he realised that Idol upon all his hopes were placed were not in his hands anymore.
“Really?” Nabiki seemed unsure looking upon the object she took from his hands. “Because it looks like another one of your brainless plots. I thought I made myself clear last time, Gosunkugi” she looked him in the eyes and Hikaru nearly fainted from fear. “I don’t really care what new absurd you try to do with that thing, but I did say you to not do anything when it can disrupt my work. You know very well that soon Ranma will fight Ryoga and I’ve already took bets… And whatever you are trying to do may disrupt the fight and it. Would. Cost. Me. MONEY”
At this moment Hikaru Gosunkugi could not take it anymore. Angering Nabiki Tendo was the very thing you would do when you try to end your life… And nothing would anger Nabiki more that making her lose money… World went dark as Hiraku finally fainted.

“Idiot” snorted Nabiki, not giving poor fool any more attention.
Now, that she took this thing – whatever it is – from him, he would not cause any chaos. Normally Nabiki didn’t care about what happens in the school. All these overpowered fools could raise it to the ground – either way it wouldn’t change anything, and it would be rebuilt the very next day. It already has happened many times. She didn’t care, as long as it didn’t stop her doing her thing. Or today it could have prevented already prepared fight, fight she did invest in… This just won’t do…
So now she could just go to see the fight…

Gosunkugi expected to use the Idol to make Akane ‘see’ him – whatever it meant for him – and to get his final ‘happily ever after’. But as it has already been said he didn’t even really know how this Idol – of an unknown origin – worked. If he at least tried to prepare before acting he would have known, that the Idol affected the carrier and not the person said carrier thought about, aiming for… or whatever. And to activate it, it must be rubbed – in the same way that you would rub a genie’s lamp.
And that exactly what Nabiki did while watching the expected fight. And then, it dawned on her. She was a slave. She just suddenly knew. It wasn't an emotion, or an idea. It was a fact. Nabiki Tendo was now a slave. There mere idea to fight it was absurd. She knew she was a slave now. At the core of her very existence, that was who she was and who she would be for the rest of her life.
And as a slave she had to serve and obey her Master. Her Master was…
14522.title: And to say Nabiki for once tried to keep order!

choices: To defend her Master’s interests Nabiki has to intervene in the fight
145221.content:
Ranma Saotome? Nabiki was confused for a moment, but it was right there. As certain as she knew that she was a slave, she also knew that her Master was Ranma-”I’m a man no matter size of my bust”-Saotome. Had that been everything? No changes in her personality, no memory loss, nothing?Nabiki kept her guard up. She already had some unfortunate experience with magic and curses, most of time they were silly but at the same time annoying and not easy to circumvent.
While there…
Ok, so she was Master Ranma's slave, but that, while brutal, didn't seem too powerful a notion to her, like it could be easily overcome. In order to try, she first started thinking about resisting, and found surprisingly that she could do that. Could she really resist Master Ranma? But then it came to her. She couldn't. She was Master Ranma's slave, so she could never resist him. She would rather stop breathing…
Ok, but Ranma wouldn't order her around anyway, mostly because he would even aware of the fact, that she’s his slave. After all she is not stupid enough to announce… Nabiki wondered for a moment if everything would just still normal if she kept quiet. But again, the answer just seemed to come to her: she was a slave, so the first thing she would do, is to say to her Master that she is his to do as he please. Well… first she would ensure that there is no one else around to hear it, so that she doesn’t cause unnecessary trouble to her Master.
Damn… that was strong! But still, there is may be a way around it. She wouldn’t want to cause trouble to Master, but let’s be honest, Ranma was a trouble magnet and not so smart. Should he be aware of what just happened, he would undoubtedly go into some new troubles, probably caused by his own rush actions. So, it would be in her Master’s own interest if she kept it for self… No, answer came to her once again, she was a slave; and it is not to slave to decide what is best for her Master. She would tell him everything and do her very best to help him in every way possible. Because even if Master Ranma would never give her an order, she was still his slave. As a slave, she had to always do what was best for him, disregarding her own wants and needs.
Nabiki no longer thought that this curse would be easy to overcome, no it was incredibly strong dangerous. She knew that she would be her Master's slave until the end of her days. She was her Master's property. She would never betray him. All that she would ever do or say again, would ultimately be for Master. Nabiki hated that she was a slave, but she knew there was nothing she could do about it. What she hated, disliked, liked or loved didn't matter, nor did what she wanted or needed, only what Master wanted or needed mattered. Only what he loved, liked, disliked or hated.
Nabiki Tendo was a selfish person, even a very selfish person. She was proud about everything she has accomplished in Nerima, running her own operation, making all these overpowered idiots – calling themselves Martial Artists – fear and respect her. And she pretty much despised Ranma Saotome. This guy or girl – his curse on itself was absurd – was a living cause of headache and a crime against a common sense. And let’s not even talk about his sense “honour” – while his whole life and family seemed to be created just to show the whole world why this “honour” should be put in the garbage…
And so, the mere idea that now she belonged to him was terrifying… but there was nothing she could do about it. And all that because of this idol… because of Gosunkugi… where the hell did he get it?! Sadly, for now there is nothing she could do about it, it was up to her Master to decide.
While Nabiki investigated her new role in life, this damn idol was still in her hand, so... innocuous in appearance. The internal investigation went on only seconds, though to her it seemed like an eternity. Done with it, she quickly put the idol in her bag, for now it was the safest place she can keep it. Once she could speak with Master and explain everything that happened, he could decide what to do with it…

Meanwhile outside Ranma Saotome was once again fighting Ryoga, completely unaware that his life is about to change…
145221.title: Her life belonged to Wild Horse from now…

info.description:
All right, I always liked Ranma so why don't try to write a story about it. Before we started, let's write a few rules:
1) NO KILLING
2) Sex is allowed, but nothing too extreme
3) The mind control can be done in every possible way ( hypnosis, drugs ...)
4) We can also perform body transformation if we want
5)Let's have a lot of fun
